sources.title: The Con Artist
sources.description: An ex-con finds his plan to go straight foiled by a loan shark who manipulates his target into taking on one last heist.

metadata.Plot: After five years in prison for grand theft auto, Vince returns to Toronto. Kranski, his old boss, insists that he repay a large debt (money lost in his arrest) by boosting cars. His cover is a mechanic's job at Kranski's garage. In his spare time, Vince welds pieces of scrap metal into sculptures; a trendy gallery owner spots one and sells it for thousands and commissions more. Art might be Vince's ticket out if he can get Kranski off his back. Meanwhile, Vince's prolix parole officer is circling, and Kristen, the gallery owner's assistant, beguiles Vince.
metadata.Actors: Rossif Sutherland, Sarah Roemer, Greg Germann
